properties.areaDesc: Whitefish Bay (U.S. Portion)/Whitefish Point to Point Iroquois MI; St. Marys River Point Iroquois to E. Potagannissing Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued December 31 at 9:06PM EST until January 1 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 25 kt and highest waves around 5
feet.

* WHERE...Whitefish Bay (U. S. Portion)/Whitefish Point to Point
Iroquois MI and St. Marys River Point Iroquois to E.
Potagannissing Bay.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY
